title: After Years in Limbo, Finding a Place of Her Own
description: There was subletting, apartment-sharing, couch-surfing, roommates, cockroaches and a guest bedroom. The story also includes a sunny one-bedroom in Brooklyn.
dc:creator: Alix Strauss
media:description: Raegan Sealy arrived at the New School in New York in 2015 with a Fulbright Scholarship in hand. After she graduated, she had a yearslong search to find an apartment of her own.
